content: i have given this mandala a new lease on life since i first released it here you see the new one if you would like to see the original you can by also clicking on the link both new and original patterns are there i had fun remaking this design in bright and bold colours however it would look lovely in any colours this little mandala is made up of 10 rounds using standing stitches and invisible joins like most of my patterns any yarn and corresponding hooks can be used would be great to use up scraps and turn them into something beautiful the one pictured here is 17cm and made in dmc natura just cotton
